snippet: Brendon Todd won the Byron Nelson Championship for his first PGA Tour title on Sunday, closing with a bogey-free, four-under-par 66 for a two-stroke win over Mike Weir in Irving, Tex.
abstract: Brendon Todd wins the Byron Nelson Championship for his first PGA Tour title; other golf news noted.
lead_paragraph: Brendon Todd won the Byron Nelson Championship for his first PGA Tour title on Sunday, closing with a bogey-free, four-under-par 66 for a two-stroke win over Mike Weir in Irving, Tex.

headline.main: Brendon Todd Wins His First PGA Tour Title
headline.print_headline: Todd Wins His First PGA Tour Title
